content: That's really helpful, thank you! I'll definitely try out those tips and the recipe. I'm excited to experiment with different dry rubs and BBQ sauces to find my favorite flavor combinations. And I'm sure my neighbor will be happy to provide some feedback on my ribs, considering they're a BBQ expert with their Weber grill. Speaking of which, do you have any recommendations for BBQ cookbooks or online resources that can help me improve my grilling skills?
